survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on home office setups to understand user satisfaction, challenges, and preferences for remote work environments.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?

questions.question_text: Which of the following equipment do you use in your home office? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional inputs.

script.question_text: Which of the following equipment do you use in your home office? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face with your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face with your home office setup?

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically work from your home office?
questions.client_notes: Use clear time ranges for ease of response.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically work from your home office?

questions.question_text: Do you have a dedicated room for your home office?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question for quick response.

script.question_text: Do you have a dedicated room for your home office?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort (e.g., back pain, eye strain) while working from your home office?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort (e.g., back pain, eye strain) while working from your home office?

questions.question_text: Which of the following would improve your home office setup? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional inputs.

script.question_text: Which of the following would improve your home office setup? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to invest in upgrading your home office setup in the next 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How likely are you to invest in upgrading your home office setup in the next 6 months?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for working from a home office?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for additional inputs.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for working from a home office?

questions.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding your home office setup?
